blogs.title: Non-Radiant
blogs.body:
You could never hope to match a Radiante!
But I will do what is necessary to be done.
blogs.author: Omen

blogs.title: Radiant
blogs.body:
We are finally free to use our power.
We will no let them capture radiante from enivronment.
blogs.author: Reyna

blogs.title: Healer & Killer
blogs.body:
I will not let you die here.
You are still need to this country!!
blogs.author: Sage

blogs.title: Revealer
blogs.body:
I know exactly where you are!!
I am not gonna let you hide, kid!!
You are Welcome ..... to die.
blogs.author: Cypher

blogs.title: Find me
blogs.body:
Find me, If you can. I will go in another dimension to destroy you and can't even touch or see me but you can feel me everywhere.
Fear me!!!
blogs.author: Yoru
